name: Rise of Kingdoms - Feast of Flames
name_original: Rise of Kingdoms - Feast of Flames
description:
Feel the intensity and excitement like you have never before in Rise of Kingdoms – Feast of Flames!

This is THE NEXT BIG THING! Rise of Kingdoms, the new clash game is here raising the bar to the next level! You can customize Hero skills and try out different combination in battle. Most of all, you can control your Hero now, and target enemy buildings and foes the way you like it! Short of diamonds? You can raid for diamonds and even earn diamonds by simply defending! Bored of normal combats? Test your skills in the Adventure mode in hundreds of missions and boss fights, unlock and craft new Mercenary Cards to bring mercenaries in your tactics. Don’t forget to upgrade Building Specials as they are much more powerful against tough enemies like Assassins, Catapults and Dragons. Or create your own Alliance with other players, build the Alliance Base, conquer other kingdoms and dominate the realm!

【WE STRONGLY RECOMMEND using iPhone5/5s for best gaming experience.】
【IF YOU ARE STUCK ON ILLUMESOFT LOGO SCREEN, PLEASE DELETE AND REINSTALL THE GAME;
IF YOU ARE STUCK ON ROK POSTER SCREEN, PLEASE CHANGE WIFI OR TRY CONNECTING LATER TO FIX THE PROBLEM, THANK YOU!】

***** Players Reviews *****

5/5 "Great game. Fresh new feel to the genre. Fast troop training keeps the tempo rolling. This will be the new App everyone will play the most. Best support from the staff that listen to the players. Clash on!" --- by Karmartz

5/5 "Wonderful game , graphics , gameplay , this is the new hottest game to watch out for! Their customer support is impeccable as well, I would highly suggest this game to anyone who loves these types of game ! 5 stars all the way , see you in game RoK!!" --- by The cat's meow

5/5 "Best of its kind! Great RTS game! Hero control during attacks. Ability to raid GEMS from other players! Top notch graphics! Must try if you like clash style games." --- by Dog_licks_shoes

5/5 "I prefer this game way more than any "CoC copies". I might even pay for elves, although I'm only starting! Definitely refreshing and I love the time it takes for troops to be ready, it's perfect, especially for the beginning. Keep it up, so far no problems :)" --- by Anomal7

***** Unique Features *****
* Control multiple Heroes in real-time strategy combat.
* Customize Hero skills to crush your enemies!
* Challenge global players and earn diamonds!
* Mind-blowing Adventure Mode, including hundreds of missions and Boss Fights!
* Unlock Mercenary Cards and new Heroes, and craft your own card to form unique strategy!
* Treasure hunt with the explorer for great prizes such as dual hero card, new mercenaries and many more!
* Awake the Statue Gods and get great bonuses over your enemies!
* Honor Rank Tournament with great weekly prizes!
* Awe-inspiring Alliance Base that you’ve never seen before in other games! Coordinate attacks with your Alliance, and chat with your friends.
* Mighty defensive towers such as Fortress, Corpse Flower and Death Ray with over 16 Specials, make the most of them!
* Raise a strong army of Heroes, dwarves, assassins and yes, siege units: Catapults! Nothing says good morning like raining death on your enemies!
* Dozens of skills, spells & traps; and experiment numerous combination of strategies!
* Receive precious prizes from the mysterious Grape Man.
* Loads of cool features coming soon!

Having problems or making a suggestion? Reach us at roksupport@illumesoft.com or illumesoft.com/forum, we’d love to hear from you!

Please note that Rise of Kingdoms – Feast of Flames requires network connection, and is free to play. However there are in-game items that can be purchased for real money. You can turn off the in-app purchases in your device’s settings only if you don’t want to use this feature.
